Factsheet

Ripe Render

Description

Platformer meets tower defense in this story-rich game inspired by the Costa Rican Día de Las Mascaradas festival. One day, grandma Tita's kids get possessed by the spirits of the gigantes and begin to wreak havoc upon the land. It's now up to her pet sloth, Teeko, to save their town.

Features

  • 7 beautiful and lush Costa Rican landscapes to explore and traverse
  • 7 unique local gigantes to unveil and defeat
  • 10+ local fruit types to hurl at enemies
  • 30+ Powerful tower upgrades
  • A unifying and heartfelt narrative

Videos

There are currently no trailers available for Teeko. Check back later for more or contact us for specific requests!

About Ripe Render

Boilerplate
Ripe Render is an emerging games studio based in San Pedro, Costa Rica and founded by Antonio Ercolani and Igor Kovacevic.
More information
More information on Ripe Render, our logo & relevant media are available here.
